column3:
“Effects are classic indica; sleepy hungry and happy. A moderate dose results in a feeling just short of couchlock, allowing you to stay mobile, but at the same time making you chair feel insanely comftorable. The high left me clear headed, I was able to respond well and carry on an intelligetnt conversation. At the same time i was also able to enjoy the music that was playing.

This weed did not make me introspecti...”

“🚀..Whoops, sorry folks!..here is the rest of my review..6 STAR on Sit-Me-On-My-Ass-Stoniness!..Relaxation, Euohoria, Horniness, Elevation, Sleepiness, big Hungry-Munchy Alert (unusual for me)!!..Unfocused and silly-mellow, perfect for a warm spring evening with the One you Love😍...Calming, Balances my Chakras, Aligns body-mind-spirit, good medication for meditation. Very sensuous in nature, opens ones heart. Uninhi...”
“Like getting a brain massage in da couch omg.....💜✌💤👼”

“Personally my favorite strain, Bubba Kush (BK) delivers a high unparalleled to most other strains. At first glance, BK is marvelous to look at. With hints of puprle and deep green on the outside of the bud, it turns a beautiful white once you go deeper into the bud. The taste is very hard to describe, but just think of tasting the air of a sugar cane field in a pinewood forest. The feeling hits you within 2 tokes, wh...”

“Was completely edgy and stressed when I picked up. I finally finished it off and even afterward I feel wonderful. All the stress I had is gone, its just RUINED the part of my brain that overthinks things. I was bordering on neurotic but this ganja fixed it.

Another really great note: you can keep cheifing without feeling like shit. I'm not a very high tolerance smoker, probably near midway. Didn't green out, didn'...”

“I think this one may be my favorite thus far. It provides good mental stimulation and physical relaxation. I'm always interested in strains that promote sleep and this one fits the bill. It's also good for recreational activities such as movies or music. My wife tells me this strain produces a much stronger odor compared to others, so I tend to vape instead of smoke it when stealth is desired. But the buzz is very pl...”

“First time I smoked Bubba Kush, it was stress relieving.. kind of subtle.
second time I underestimated it, smoked too much and felt couchlocked with a mild 3/10 anxiety for about 10 minutes, I ate soup crackers while my brains mocked me and my head felt smushed in a zone yet super focused... this strain can seriously wack you out while at the same time enhancing your focus to a pinpoint... probably good for sex and ...”

“Have fun with this one, one joint of this particularly sticky bud will leave you inevitably couchlocked for at least 3 hours. Music and some HD trippy visuals on a TV make the experience one of a kind with this incredibly powerful indica.”
“A poster Child for Indica it definitely gets the job done. one full bowl of this will have you Watching tv on the couch or in bed with a smile on your face”

“Picked up some Bubba Kush from my tested dispensary that I visit this CBN percentage came out to be 2.48% and the THC level is at 19.62%.this Bubba Kush is particularly very heavy on the dry mouth taste of Cherrywood and earth tones I would say that this is a very very very heavy strain if you're looking for pain killer to the max and if you have a very hard time sleeping but would cost usually has a high CBN amount....”

“absolutely love this strain, I get easily stressed out and have troubles sleeping but with this strain I had zero stress and was always relaxed. With this strain I never got paranoid and was always in a happy mood. 10/10”
“Started out with an uplifting head high then settled in for a relaxing  body high that tucked me in for a good nights sleep :)”

“I had the bubba Skywalker and was I impressed up,down, sideways and all around. one of the fruitiest best mind and body highs. Intensity just above average great for pain and getting to your relaxation realm.”
“I suffer from heavy depression and anxiety and this strain was enjoyable to smoke. It has a nice euphoric high that just makes me feel good.”

“Few strains are as notorious as bubba Kush. Sweet and powerful, the taste and high of bubba will become one of your favourites. Don't look past this gem, few strains are in such high demand. One of the main attributes of this strain is that it is easy to grow so finding high quality bubba is easier than most other. Enjoy responsibly”
“Good stuff one of my favorite indicas.”
“when I use this it takes away pain,muscle spasms, helps take the edge off so I can get sleepy,,nice evening medicne”

“What is there to say about this legendary strain that hasn't already been said. This is as good as it gets. This is why we consume cannabis in the first place. Euphoria and relaxation without the couch-lock. My all-time favorite indica.”
“The Bubba Kush we get at our shop is known as Wheelchair.  It is one of the best strains I have seen lately, especially the PURPLE Bubba Kush!!!  great medicine!”
“Definitely one of the better buds I've smoked. It's my prefered high." It brings relaxation to the max
column4: stress free
column5: and laughing. Not to mention how beautiful the bud actually is!”"

column3: “Very great indica but definitely just for taking it easy. Also just to warn you this shit will give you the munchies like none other. I ate 4 fucking hot pockets and still was hungry. These boat times are hungry times!”

“Hardcore indica, I would not use this during the day if you have things you need to accomplish. The head high is short lived and quickly turns into a heavy sedated body high. This is one of my personal nighttime strains.”

“Got this strain from a dispensary in Denver. This strain somehow managed to provide an Indica type high without any heavy stone; extremely brilliant for a functional high that is not overwhelming like a Sativa. I would imagine this would be great for depression and ADD. I could easily read a book while high on this strain but in a good way as the high is not too weak just very functional. Leaves short term memory int...”

“a top 5 strain for me.  I just picked up some flower last week that I couldn't believe, it came from Virginia farms in Washington,  and the THCA was brace yourself 38.6%. This plant gets stronger ever time I see it.  It has that classic kush flavor and despite being smooth it will punch you straight in the face.  Nice relaxing body high,  great for blocking pain and knocking you out for the night in the best possible...”

“I had trouble picking between 4 stars & 4 1/2 because this is an exceptional indica. If you're a newbie or have a low tolerance you might pass out. This bud gets you stoned! I had an oz of it (I never write a review until I've smoked an oz of it) and it was such good bud I smoked it (well w one other person) in 10 days. I had planned for it to last @ least for 2 weeks! 
It's great for pain, insomnia and lack of appit...”

“First off, I'm probably going to rate all my reviews at 5 lmao.. Bubba, oh Bubba, 😂 nice smoke, didn't make me sleepy, actually was ready to go eat. Headed to Pappadeaux tonight lmao. Happy lifts to all of you ✌”
“So far this is the only strain that relieves my trigeminal neuralgia pain. It is a godsend.”
“Tastes sweet. Dense buds. Has purple and green color. Nice indica calm. Very good vibes from Bubba Kush.”

“Like a good punch to the brain. One of the most, if not the most potent strain I've ever tried. This brings on a full mind & body stone immediately. All pain alleviated and insomnia cured. I actually found it hard to stay awake after 20 minutes. I wouldn't recommend smoking this in public, this is something to knock you right out. If you're looking for something to cure insomnia, it doesn't get better than this. It's...”

“Medicinally: This is a very high-quality medicine that will knock out even the caffein addict. Perfect for those who have trouble falling/staying asleep. Also great for relieving aches and pains of any sort; in other words, perfect for winding down after a long-day's work.

Recreationally: If you are looking for a long night in with the bros, this is the one. It makes music sound better, food taste better, bad tele...”

“Honestly this has to be in my Top 3 indica strains. If we're being honest, it's probably in my top 5 overall strains. Beautiful aroma and the taste is very satisfying too the palette. Can be a bit harsh on the lungs depending on how you choose to consume. I personally recommend using a volcano set at 380, but obviously we all know this is the best method when it comes to cannabis consumption. The effects are amazing....”
“Amazing. Calmed me down so good. I have Tourette's.. Kept me from twitching and was so relaxed. So euphoric! I didn't wanna move I just wante to sit in the woods, I coulda watched paint dry hah”
“Subtle high, but powerful as fuck. quick head change at first and then it hits your body and you don't wanna move from your couch.”
“Basically gets you shittered, heavy indica high that hits you straight in the dome, then slowly makes it's way in waves through your body.”

“Honestly this has to be in my Top 3 indica strains. If we're being honest, it's probably in my top 5 overall strains. Beautiful aroma and the taste is very satisfying too the palette. Can be a bit harsh on the lungs depending on how you choose to consume. I personally recommend using a volcano set at 380, but obviously we all know this is the best method when it comes to cannabis consumption. The effects are amazing....”
“I have really bad back pains but when I took a few hits of  the bong I felt good very good high I love this bubba kush.”

“One of the most popular indica strains around, Bubba Kush packs a punch. It's effects come on within minutes and can continue to build. I love this as an evening smoke or a lazy day off because of the 'couch coma' effect it can produce. easy hitting smoke that has some good subtle flavors going on. 

For me personally Bubba Kush, or 'BK', has always been very consistent. I know that I'm getting a strain that is going...”
“Amazing strain great for night time one of my favorite indicas, bub me some bubba”
“Great fruity taste and mellow high, one of my favorite strains”

“Wake n Bake this morning with some BubbaK, had about half a joint and a one hitter; was definitely relaxing, great for just chilling out and watching some Metalocalypse. Did some chores happily and then fell asleep. Yet again, this strain has proved effective for me.”
“I tried the concentrate and it was dynamite. I started sweating off one dab and the pain relief and relaxation was long lasting.”
“Great fruity taste and mellow high, one of my favorite strains”

“Wake n Bake this morning with some BubbaK, had about half a joint and a one hitter; was definitely relaxing, great for just chilling out and watching some Metalocalypse. Did some chores happily and then fell asleep. Yet again, this strain has proved effective for me.”
“Amazing strain great for night time one of my favorite indicas, bub me some bubba”

“Location: L'Eagle Services 
THC: 17.10 - 18.59%
CBD: 0.00%

Additional Notes:  It had been far, far too long since I had this strain. 

Appearance Rating: 5.00
Appearance Description: While many of the pieces are smaller in size, they are not overly compact. They are a bright lime green in color with a few purple highlights. They are very well trimmed and have a good amount of mature crystals. 

Taste Rating: 4.00
Ta...”

“Oh, how there is nothing like a thick, chewy indica for its narcotic effects and body buzz.  I've had Bubba Kush before, and loved it and my current batch (from Fusion - a great access point) is high quality and thoroughly enjoyable.  To me it's almost as good as Hindu Kush.  Almost, but not quite.  Still, it's a close second and a good substitute if Hindu Kush isn't available. 

The taste isn't particularly lovely...”

“Love this one. If u need to relax and unwind after a long ass day of work Bubba is for u. So chill. If u and ur wife are arguing and u never want to speak to her again this strain will make u remember how much u love her and need her. Very introspective strain. I love it. I cldnt ask for a better strain. The buds are Super Dense and busts up fabulously to roll hog legs. Have fun and keep smoking.”

“Vaped in O. Pen Form: Tasty, quick onset brought welcome pain relief and muscle relaxation ....Gently cradled me to sleep😴 while those endless  sheep🐑 jumped over that infinate fence... Kind Bubba Kush...Kind.”

“One of the best Indicas I've had the pleasure of smoking. Usually I prefer Sativa strains, so I was reluctant to buy some Indica, but it was definitely worth it. Not as strong as the other strains, like Sour D or OG Kush, but still a great one to have and chill with.”

“Vaped in O. Pen Form: Tasty, quick onset brought welcome pain relief and muscle relaxation ....Gently cradled me to sleep😴 while those endless  sheep🐑 jumped over that infinate fence... Kind Bubba Kush...Kind.”
“O.pen vape.  Nice, pleasant, mellow buzz.  Great for end of the evening.”

“This is, by far, my favorite indica.
The smell is unforgettable.
I've had multiple different strain combos of this indica..
and the bubba kush is always the dominant smell.
Sticky, sparkling, potent, dense buds.
Perfect sleeper.”

“I'm in love with this beautiful beast. It blankets me in this warm , relaxed, euphoric state of bliss. A must if you have chronic pain like me. calms pain and kills the upset stomach. A medical Dream”

“Holy shit guys. I rarely write reviews on here but wow. I have a ridiculously high tolerance (I was dabbing frequently every day and pretty soon not even dabs would get me where I wanted to go) so I am currently on a tolerance break of just vape pens (using concentrate) and flower 2 times a day. 

ANYWAY, I have been on the hunt for a strain that helps with my insomnia. The medication I'm on, paired with chronic back...”

“I personally love this Indika strain.
intryed this because of nerve pain in the head after a surgery and big back pain. I also suffer Neurofibromatosis or NF1. I also have a big lack of appetite so for me this is a pretty good strain if you want to use it as medicine.”

“Great strain for treating ADD/ADHD. I used to take methylphenidate, since medical marijuana treatment hasn't been approved in my country. I decided to switch to medical marijuana cuz of the side effects methylphenidate had on my which were: lack of apettite, agression, restlessness, usual behavior and motor tics. I also experienced rapid heartbeats(tachicardia). I started smoking 0.2g in the morning and 0.2g at night...”

“Great strain for treating ADD/ADHD. I used to take methylphenidate, since medical marijuana treatment hasn't been approved in my country. I decided to switch to medical marijuana cuz of the side effects methylphenidate had on my which were: lack of apettite, agression, restlessness, usual behavior and motor tics. I also experienced rapid heartbeats(tachicardia). I started smoking 0.2g in the morning and 0.2g at night...”

“I'm in love with this beautiful beast. It blankets me in this warm , relaxed, euphoric state of bliss. A must if you have chronic pain like me. calms pain and kills the upset stomach. A medical Dream”

“Bubba Kush is great for just relaxation. It makes you sleepy towards the come down but from the begging your happy as can be. One negative effect that i see on it is that I'm always so fucking hungry but i try to drink a lot of water. But all in all its great i love it. Cant wait to smoke it thanksgiving day😛😛”

“Oh, what can you say about Bubba?  If he was a dude, he'd be welcomed anytime, anyplace, anywhere! 
Bubba has a special place in my heart.  Was reintroduced to Cannabis at 39 yrs old, after trying every pain killer there was. I wanted off, but the panic disorder & nerve pain alone is insane (TN & spinal degeneration neuropathy).  Also have chronic pancreatitis, thanks to western meds. So, after getting my card, I was...”
“Sky high guys. Thanks again for another hands down best sleep I've had in while woke up nice and toasted still”

“THIS STRAIN SAVED MY LIFE.

I had to review again. I had a severe concussion which was when I made my first raving review but I got doubled-tapped again and was having seizures that lasted 1-2 hours. Constant. I know for a FACT I would be dead without this so let me just say, thank you so much whoever made this. You literally saved my life. 

I;ve never experienced anything more painful than traumatic brain induced s...”

“Probably 4.5 of 5 stars for this indica — great taste, pretty smooth, but a bit harsh of a smoke for me. Otherwise intense, uplifting (in mellow, de-stressing way), and a great bedtime smoke – would love to try in oil form since harshness of particular strain was only negative for me, really.”
“top 3 strain,one of the  best strain , must try”
“top 3 strain,one of the  best strain , must try”

“Smoked down on this last night. Nice experience. A smooth taste, the high can carry out for a long time without a sudden down like many strains. If you're looking for a relaxing time and a night in, this is it.”

“When I find well grown BUBBA I normally buy my legal limit. This strong Kush flower is hard hitting and very relaxing. The smell is pungent and earthy. For pain fighting flower this is in my all time top 5.”

“no strain listing yet but this review is for a variant caked bubba skywalker thought to be pre98 bubba  with og skywalker.


very India dominant, very spacey and continues to build - hard hitting India 5 out of 5 for everything.

the bus are beautiful dark tinted ave dense with amazing trichromes and I suspect a thc content ::) the upper 20's.

amazing taste and smell - it's the best of both parents and in my opinion...”
“Sky high guys. Thanks again for another hands down best sleep I've had in while woke up nice and toasted still”

“Probably 4.5 of 5 stars for this indica — great taste, pretty smooth, but a bit harsh of a smoke for me. Otherwise intense, uplifting (in mellow, de-stressing way), and a great bedtime smoke – would love to try in oil form since harshness of particular strain was only negative for me, really.”

“Blue-ish bud, earthy and slightly sweet taste. When smoked on its own very heavy narcotic effects, nice body buzz, and definitely makes you stupid. With a cup of coffee I found myself to be very creative and relaxed. I wound up throwing on The Office and starting a few new art projects. As someone who prefers sativa this isn't my favourite but it's not a bad choice if you're looking to kick back in the evening.”

“Definitely a bed time go-to. Relaxing, pain relief, and sedating effects that have eased me to sleep much better than any sleep aids, prescription or not. Much like Brother's kush but seems to pack a bit more of a punch. One of my favorite indicas!”
“Smoked a j of this, sat in my chair laughing to myself...shortly after i was past out with food in my mouth...good for bed time tokes !”

“Very euphoric smoke. Instantly takes effect and came on strong with just one hit from a ice filled bong. Very nice tasting, very mellow and smooth. Lasts for a quite awhile, and the comedown is very gradual.”
“I had some bubble Kush wax and it was great really good. great for when I'm trying to relax and go to sleep great night time smoke”
“Best strain for helping me to fall asleep. Turns off all the anxious monkey mind for a good nites sleep”

“Enhanced senses! Oh my god.  My colors and sounds are so much brighter.  My eyes are so heavy from the amount of color I'm seeing.  It's fantastic.  It made my normal boring surroundings awesome.  Thanks Bubba Kush.  




Bubba Kush No
column4: thank you.  Thank you.”"

column3: “Definitely had the Bubble Gum & Kush strain. Sweet taste. Lacking on smell, but the effect is one of the best.”
“never have I been this high/sleepy/relaxed yet awake/upflifted/creative.  can not recommend anything else better than bubba k if this is the experience you're looking for”

“if any one is actually reading this, YOU GOTTA TRY THIS 1.
it's been awhile sense the flower has layed me down. this is 1 that will not only did it stop the arthritis pain, but i have 3 bulging disc's that stopped hurting! woo-hoo!!
so go you little stoner's and partake of this wonderful God given gift of easing pain. 2 thumbs up to God for making this weed.”
“Definitely had the Bubble Gum & Kush strain. Sweet taste. Lacking on smell, but the effect is one of the best.”

“One of the most delectable strains I've ever smoked. First of all, this stuff looks like it's from outer space. Completely covered in tiny crystals with that purple frosty tinge. The taste is incredibly smooth and sweet. So potent it gets you high with one hit. Smoked two bowls of this after two bowls of trainwreck with a friend. Chilled for pretty much the entire day. Ate a lot of food and played some video games. T...”

I'd read that changing strains helps sometimes.  This Bubba Kush bud had crystally sugar leaves, and when looking at it with a lit magnifier, just glistened with crystals!  I like the flavor, very tangy sweet, round. After ne...”

Outside I peed on a cold ground and when my piss steamed I thought I was a dragon, we went and got snacks, combos and tea. We sang the word combos in a barber shop quartet. We climbed on a roof overlooking the town. It was beautiful. On the walk to the...”

“Bubba Kush is a very tasty and powerful medicine. I located this strain here in the desert south west and is some of the best indica I have tried to date. This is one strain I will want to use for pain. When I had the shingles the Bubba Kush even reduced the burning pain caused by the virus and helped me sleep.”

Excellent and long lasting effect. Neural based pain strongly suppressed. Deeply relaxing so watch out for too heavy a session as you may very well just go to sleep as there is a rather strong soporific effect.

Happy buzz with relaxed musculoskeletal pain relief associated...”

I like the flavor, very tangy sweet, round. After ne...”

“A heavy pinching of the eyes and some trouble to stay awake are hallmarks of this strain, those with low tolerance ought to beware. Bubba Kush brings on intense euphoria and relaxation that will leave you feeling like sitting the next few hours out on the couch or in bed daydreaming or literally dreaming.

That being said, more seasoned consumers ought to find the relaxation enjoyable in moderate doses, while still f...”

“Bubba Kush from Ilera delivers strong end of the day relief. Krushed my back and joint pain and relieved muscle cramps and spasms to some degree. Though the gram from Ilera seemed a little light. I normally get 2 sessions from a gram, but only got one from this. The buds were dark green, almost purple. Had a cafe mocha flavor with a slightly bitter finish. Vaped well. Left me relaxed and a tad giggly. Got a good nigh...”
“This strain can summon the Quiet One. once this happens you are sure to be flying into the cloud of bliss and piney euphoria.”

“I purchased the trichomes to put on to of other flower. Every time I medicate with these trichomes there is a strong sweet flavor that always comes through. After the medication kicks in I feel tranquil, relaxed, content, and comfortable like I'm snuggled up next to a fire on a cool autumn night. While I'm feeling safe and secure I am able to drift off to a restful night sleep, leaving me refreshed in the morning. I ...”
“This is not bubble gum x kush, it is a rare sister of some basic  og kush that was amidst some chem dawg varieties that got crossed.”
“What is stress?  Where is the pain?  This strain makes me ask these questions.  It doesn't take over my mind and allows me to do whatever I need to do.  I love it!”

“Euphorically calming is the best way to describe this strain. Light and airy—kind of like a floaty feeling. column3: “Bubba Kush is the epitome of top notch kush with its narcotic body stone. The smell is so inviting and the taste is full of dank terpenes. Definitely high in myrcene and pinene. Great sedation, couch lock, munchies, stress relief, and sleep 5/5”

column4: had no pain in my knee and that was fantastic. Can't wait to get some more.”"

column3: “This strain is POTENT. Its a very nice Indica and is a great mood setter, it helps great with anxiety, and will Definetly help you get to bed”

Had a cafe mocha flavor with a slightly bitter finish. Vaped well. Left me relaxed and a tad giggly. Got a good nigh...”

Universal1”

Highly recommended.”

column4: I can't feel my legs..."  Smoke too much of this earthy flavored goodness and you just might lose feeling in the rest of your body too.  You've been warned!”"

column3: “Taste is amazing and quality is good .”
“Explosive flowery and earthy tones. Solid high that lasts a few hours. Will relax your mind and body.”
“Great laid back feel.”

“Supposed to walk there / 
That ain’t happening no more / 
Another day then.”
“had two bong chops and the effects kicked in instantly, gives a good dreamy and chill time. great for a late night sesh”

“Love love love it!
Great help for evenings”
“Good Head effect. Really harsh.”

“Kinda of a pain strain. Yield is decent but its one of those hashy types that foesnt really build buds from calyx's. It has super crystally leaf and has a tendency to go purple around week 7-8. It has a great kushy flavor and a very viscous oil that burns the back of your throat. The way it stacks up sugar leaf is begging for a pmd outbreak.”

“One of my personal favorites. I used to not like Kush but the Bubba has made me a believer. It is like a sword that cuts through reality and leaves you in tune with your surroundings. A good bud if you are a beginner looking for something stronger or a veteran looking for something to get you stoned but not obliterated. But of course like with any Indica strain, smoke too much and you'll be out like a light.”

“Hoped to ease insomnia but still needed to take pills 2 hours later. Very good for muscle relaxation, I found. Relaxed muscles continued through the next morning. Dosage was administered by smoking; half of one cigarette paper sized roll-up. Did not cut or adjust.  I despise tobacco and ran out of AC/DC to use as a base to then be seasoned.  So yeah, took it neat. Altered perception. Could not really absorb more than...”
“I love this strand! A little light on the thc but still a nice euphoric high.”

“1-10
Pain: 7
Stress: 6
Relaxation: 7

Tried it for my sinus headaches. It dulled the pain but not as much as I’d hoped it would.”
“a must grab every time, chill happy high.”

“A very strong strain.  Other then that i love it.  Anytime you need to sleep or do nothing, this is the strain!  I have to vape a smaller amount (about .2 of a gram) otherwise it is to strong for me.”
“Exceptiona taste and smell, nice relaxation but the effects don't last for too long.”
“Good Head effect. Really harsh.”
“Awesome”

Another day then.”

“The ultimate shut down smoke! Smooth flavor, nice pungent, but sweet aroma. Cool buzz, both head and body. This stuff makes my eyelids feel about an inch thick! IMO a definite nighttime only strain...so relaxing, not much paranoia...a little munchies, but not to where I could eat an elephant like so many indicas produce. Prly my new fave for my insomnia! Can't believe I just now tried this great medicine...”
“had two bong chops and the effects kicked in instantly, gives a good dreamy and chill time. great for a late night sesh”

Great help for evenings”

Great help for evenings”

“I asked for a rec for a good daytime indica at Sage Naturals, and the person who helped me suggested this and she was right, for sure! Clarity of mind, but so so happy (and relaxed). The joy is followed by the pull of a nap, though.”
“Exceptiona taste and smell, nice relaxation but the effects don't last for too long.”
“this shit had me feelin like rick when governor shot him. u know when Carl had pudding”
“Solid indica. Helps with pain. I use in the daytime, but I like mostly indicas”
“This strain gets you sooo faded”
“Exceptiona taste and smell, nice relaxation but the effects don't last for too long.”
“Solid indica. Helps with pain. I use in the daytime, but I like mostly indicas”
“decent strain very potent”
“Smells like the bomb shiggity wang dang”
“This strain gets you sooo faded”

“Tried this in shatter. Relax and let your body do the rest. Very nice. Want to try the flower, for some reason I get off more on flower than shatter??? A lot like GDP!! Also a shout out too my boys in Louisanna for putting this strain out there.”

“Smoked this strain a lot recently over exam period, so feel like I have a pretty good appreciation of it.

There is no real body high, and it does make you somewhat retarded so no good for working on, nor is it good for meeting strangers. I’d smoke this with friends when watching an event or tv, or to just sit back and enjoy some music or netflix while I unwind. 

A lot of my friends really like this strain a lot tho...”
“Beautiful red hairs, dense compact nugs, mellow high. Daytime use recommended”
“This strain gets you sooo faded”
“Amazing bud, definitely one of the best indicas I've had in a long time. Gives you the standard indica stone but with a way more euphoric component. Very psychedelic and mellow.”

“It seriously kicked my arse.


I was sitting at my desk listening to hardcore, some wobbles turned to ducks. I was paranoid a fleet of ducks was going to come in through my window.

I started breathing hard. Some time later I realized there was a brown bear behind me about to injure. I then realized, I have medicated with some experimental powerade branded waterfall devices. There's a train out doors.”
“Dis ish hit da.spot”

“Tried this in shatter. Relax and let your body do the rest. Very nice. Want to try the flower, for some reason I get off more on flower than shatter??? A lot like GDP!! Also a shout out too my boys in Louisanna for putting this strain out there.”
“BIG BUBBA!”

“Smoked this strain a lot recently over exam period, so feel like I have a pretty good appreciation of it.

There is no real body high, and it does make you somewhat retarded so no good for working on, nor is it good for meeting strangers. I’d smoke this with friends when watching an event or tv, or to just sit back and enjoy some music or netflix while I unwind. 

A lot of my friends really like this strain a lot tho...”
“Beautiful red hairs, dense compact nugs, mellow high. Daytime use recommended”
“This strain gets you sooo faded”

“Ive smoked Bubba Kush twice now, the first time the nuggs were still moist and it was a great out and partying high, smoked it again today and nuggs were a bit dry. Felt the high pass too quickly though unfortunatley but in its climax its great!”

“Tried this in shatter. Relax and let your body do the rest. Very nice. Want to try the flower, for some reason I get off more on flower than shatter??? A lot like GDP!! Also a shout out too my boys in Louisanna for putting this strain out there.”

“Initial high created a genuine laughter and lightness. Followed by a strong couch lock and laziness. Didn't feel as if the buzz lasted as long as other indica's I've tried, although the first hour or so was intense.”

“Smoked this strain a lot recently over exam period, so feel like I have a pretty good appreciation of it.

There is no real body high, and it does make you somewhat retarded so no good for working on, nor is it good for meeting strangers. I’d smoke this with friends when watching an event or tv, or to just sit back and enjoy some music or netflix while I unwind. 

A lot of my friends really like this strain a lot tho...”
“Beautiful red hairs, dense compact nugs, mellow high. Daytime use recommended”
“I've been growing my Bubba Plant for 6 Weeks now and I can say that I am impressed with the way looks, smells, and grows! (indoor)👏”
“real chill high,just vibin with my bros,loved the taste,very good plant”
“Beautiful red hairs, dense compact nugs, mellow high. Daytime use recommended”
“I've been growing my Bubba Plant for 6 Weeks now and I can say that I am impressed with the way looks, smells, and grows! (indoor)👏”
“real chill high,just vibin with my bros,loved the taste,very good plant”
“Great taste and very smooth!”
“my fave...”
“superb! Quick heavy head high, euphoric and dreamy. Beautiful sugar coated purple buds. Paid full price, but worth it. Perfect bedtime bud.”

“very smooth almost like the smokes not even there untill you feel it. then you just get a gust of calmness relaxation. I didn't get a taste of a chocolate undertone but then again I was left with a unusual flavor on my tongue afterwards earthy but just very smooth.”
“I've been growing my Bubba Plant for 6 Weeks now and I can say that I am impressed with the way looks, smells, and grows! (indoor)👏”
“real chill high,just vibin with my bros,loved the taste,very good plant”
“Great taste and very smooth!”

“Very pleased with this strain. Just smoked a bowl of it and its a quick hitting body high. I just got back from a day of snowboarding and it was very relaxing. Completely eliminated the soreness. I would definitely recommend this to anyone with pain or soreness.”
“love my Bubba not as good as the original pre1998 Bubba but same family little less potent”
“Bubba Kush is great for all the insomniacs out there. Take 2-3 hits and ur body will feel so relaxed tht u will just doze off and wake up feeling great.”
“superb! Quick heavy head high, euphoric and dreamy. Beautiful sugar coated purple buds. Paid full price, but worth it. Perfect bedtime bud.”

“very smooth almost like the smokes not even there untill you feel it. then you just get a gust of calmness relaxation. I didn't get a taste of a chocolate undertone but then again I was left with a unusual flavor on my tongue afterwards earthy but just very smooth.”

“Arguably the nicest smelling pot ever. Really pungent, it never fails to get me absolutely ripped. Couchlock is a guarantee if you over do it. The perfect indica stone. Great for pain. Highy recommended.”

“A lot of different strains here advertise many different effects. Bubba Kush has been one of those rare occurrences when it acts exactly as advertised . If I could get this thing six stars out of five I would !”

“Great all around indica, full-body/couch lock.
Great for insomnia and pain relief, also could be used to increase appetite.”

“Bubba Kush is a flower everyone must try once.All around balanced High.Taste pine and woody.Looks and smells great.Helps with back pain but not the best for it.But i would grab it again above many other strains.”

“I like this better than most but still not as much as OG strains, when I opened the bag, (sealed) I smell hit me I've never noticed before n the only way I can describe it was, vegtables....the buds were disappointing to look at, stringy n small. well just say looks can be decieving! the high was better than most! i really like that it was slow burning too! it lost 2 stars cause of taste and appearance and smell. but...”

“Got to be one of the best strains i've ever had, amazing high, you will be very very relaxed and when you sit down moving won't be a option when you sit down your chair will feel amazing and you will get hungy as and just have an amazing body high. ENJOY”
“Tastes and works wonderful. Love it.”

“I was gone. I was seeing clowns in the kitchen. my boyfriend and his friend were laughing at me cause I didn't wanna turn the light out and it was a good ass night. chill and relaxed . one of my Favorite strains 💗”

“Strong sweet aroma and satisfying buzz make this Indica a prize. Heavy, calming, and relaxing as every high Indica should be. Great for watching reruns or hanging out, also gets those creative juices flowing. leading to spacey almost daydreamy moments. However growing Bubba can take some real practic. Pre 89' strains of Bubba are hungry little ones. They require a high nutrient intake to make them explode in the flow...”
“Good smoke”
“white mountain has the best bubba kush it is so relaxing really nice flowers .”

“It's a heavy, healing high.
Make sure you're comfortable when you smoke it cuz you will need it🙏🏼”

“not to crazy about the taste
or the quality”
“love this”
“i love this med. good for everything!  a must try!”
“My personal favorite strain. Very relaxed high with minimal negative effects.”

“The first hit off my pen leaves me heavy headed and my eyelids suddenly feel like sandbags are attached to them.  Two more and a sedentary warmth starts to spread through my body. Lovely for insomnia and vegging out”
“Ohh yes. I love it.”
“very dank flower , okay smell.. and definitely will put you to sleep or in a heavy yet mellow couch lock”

“I stick with the consensus that this is truly the body buz bud. Heavy couch sinking, popcorn eating Futurama watching vibes from this strain. Very earthy taste with flavors of pine, coffee or something. DO NOT under any circumstances plan anything to do after enjoying this smooth, mellow herb. It'll make you feelin nice and chill.”

“Bubba Kush I've had from a variety of growers, but the most recent one was particularly good.
The high was sleepy relaxed dreamy happy and hungry all in a nice stew. 
I was able to chat up the people I was with just fine and kept up with conversation and felt pretty chill the whole time as I was interested in things but not especially invested. 

Flavor was a deep earthy sweet pine and was smoked via joint.”
“Smells greatly of Chicken at first break of a good nug, some are alot of green & little purple. Then there are some that are covered in purple/black with little green”

“Very good strain after a long day of work or if you have some stress , after like 40 min or so I end up falling asleep or in a heavy couch lock and everything seems to go by Super slow and it feels good ...definitely one of my top five indica's”
“good weed, i was so... happy and energetic... This weed is not my favorite weed but i like it a lot”
“Strong bud. Full head and body effects that last a couple of hours for me. Deep earthy and pungent flavors. This is my Indica of choice for getting baked and blasted.”
“When I tried it was a very smooth high.  With no nasty after taste.  It didn't last very long, but a good time.”
“I like the strain for stress relief it doesn't knock you out like most indicas.  Nice and mellow”
“From the 3rd puff, it turns your brain high so fast. I recommend it for bed-time”
“Definitely makes me hungry 😩”
“This is the ONLY strain that has helped with sleep. I absolutely love how it helped with falling asleep, keeping my mind ‘quiet’, and feeling pretty clear after waking up👍🏻👍🏻🙌🏻”

“This is a great strain for late night. You will be put down in no time. Great for pain, insomnia, and stress. An all around great flower for calming down and relaxing. This was the first strain that I bought and smoked from a medical dispensary, so I might have a bit of a bias towards it. The taste is definitely kush. Not much of another way to explain it. I don't think the taste is that great, but it isn't awful eit...”

“This is really nice for a full Indica... It doesn't knock me out, but it makes me lazy.... but focused lazy.... if I play a game I can zone and stay up... but if I watch a movie I might pass out 1/2 to 3/4 of the way through”

“not to crazy about the taste
or the quality”

“This is really nice for a full Indica... It doesn't knock me out, but it makes me lazy.... but focused lazy.... if I play a game I can zone and stay up... but if I watch a movie I might pass out 1/2 to 3/4 of the way through”

“Quick too the point.Great back relief but not so much that you can't assess. Not to dopy with a good mind glow. for my situation at this particular juncture.  With no Wu Shu Tai Chi practice today. 4.75 4.8 with no idea how too improve.”
“I got several different strains. Out of everyone this by far is the best. I'm stuck to the couch .”

“Nice job Einstein Buds!! Needed a good night time med. Suggested some Bubba Kush and could not be more pleased. Nice light piney taste and has a sweet smell. The nugs are green with amber hairs very nicely cured. Another gr8 med thx R&C! You always come through with something better.
cya soon 

btiredofdepression”

“Perfect strain for night time early am use. Relaxes you completely deep body buzz and over all just perfect buzz. I'm a straight sativia smoker but this indica just made me a believer :) I sware I'm even experiencing tripping like effects:) lol:)”
“Thats shit is goooood 🤤✌️”
“My Girlfriend & I got an 8th of this, and couldn't have been happier. some excellent stuff. so sticky & resin-y. sooo good. Both of us greatly recommend it.”
“Thats shit is goooood 🤤✌️”
“My Girlfriend & I got an 8th of this, and couldn't have been happier. some excellent stuff. so sticky & resin-y. sooo good. Both of us greatly recommend it.”

“I really like Bubba Kush. It's true that it's a head high. The description is spot on when it says that it starts in the head and moves down, although it's not that of an intense head high. I'd say it's 80% head high / 20% body and definitely the body high intensifies slowly.

I find that I can be really productive on Bubba Kush and tend to be very focused in what ever I'm doing while on it.  I definitely feel lazy...”

“this is an awesome strain if the grower doesn't cut corners. I got some that smelled great look great tasted great but the high just wasn't there and it squeaked as if you were cutting up plastic when you cut it. Growers are being greedy and not curing properly.”

“wow this batch has a real good lemon zip right off! !! nice tight darkish buds lots of crystals. very good for social meeting and good pain relief. aphrodisiac qualities. ..whatever sweetener he used worked and good flush”
“Blood shot red eyes, Made me feel very sleepy... only if I was just home smoking it by myself but if I was around with friends, it kept me a bit awake and focused”
“helps with my depression”

“Obviously makes you sleepy (best sleep), but not instantly so you can feel good, even energized for a little while. This strain makes me go to sleep at like 8:30pm and so I wake up super early, which i don’t mind, but not good for when i wake up because it puts me back to sleep. I will say it is not good for remedying period cramps.”
“Great for nighttime use. Knocks me right the fuck out. Very relaxing, and overall a very potent strain.”

“Such a winner. Bubba Kush done right is packed with THC crystals making its green much lighter in color than most Kushes. Strong with a great taste. A real money's worth of what you are buying. enjoy!”

“fat round buds. piny, fresh, sweet, lemons and wood aromas. 
 calyx to leaf ratio: 8
One hit= heavy eyes. Calming effect.
Two =nice flavour, lung expansion. watery eyes.
Three= its rad. just want to close your eyes and listen to music.

Bubba Kush is a potent strain
column4: considered a worldwide hit by many smokers. It is quite flavorful
column5: bearing a strong earthy taste and has a smooth aftertaste. Getting hooked is e...”"

column3: “Nice body buzz. Relaxing. Sweet taste, yet not fruity.”
“Great bud. Very dense and just fire. Sitting here baked and it feels great. Great head and body high”
“Bubba Kush is a nice mellow, chilled smoke.”
“over ratted”
“Good but makes me real sleepy after about two hours after use.”
“over ratted”
“Good but makes me real sleepy after about two hours after use.”

“I took one rip and set my bong down not expecting how hard it hit. Immediate effects, music is amazing with this bud. The buzz lasted for a good hour to hour and a half and its one of the better buds i've smoked.”
“A wonderful mellow high. Left me feeling relaxed and positive. Made me pretty sluggish and stuck to the couch.”

“Bubba Kush is a quality strain which gives you exactly what you would expect from an indica. Typical symptoms of dry mouth, sleepiness, and euphoria.

The inhale is very smooth and the exhale leaves an earthy flavor with a hint of coffee and Swiss chocolate fragrances. 

The aftermath quickly led to dry mouth then a physical sense of euphoria making it easy to get comfortable almost anywhere. In addition, loss of app...”

“Fantastic strain! Smoked heavy amount in large group, party type setting, and this stuff yielded some absolutely stellar conversation. However, what we have is from a dispensary and the bag says BB, for Bubba Bush. When we were told it was Bubba Bush originally I thought it was a typo and meant Bubba Kush considering I couldn’t find anything for Bubba Bush. So if Bush is the same as Kush, this strain will go down as ...”
“My reliable go to for migraine and pain relief. Very enjoyable smell. Couchlock and a lot of hunger in larger doses. Very relaxing.”
“nice high. hits you in the head for about 1 and a 1/2 hours then sinks into your body and makes you just a very relaxed couch potatoe. smells like fruit too. nice orange hairs. very indicaish”
“very smooth and GREAT taste!”
“Definitely not as good as Blue Blueberry Hogs, but I'd still judge it as a fairly nice high.”
“Great strain, good flavour and gets you really medicated. I highly suggest trying this strain if you can get your hands on it.”

“Powerful, classic, lots of tingly body buzz. Feels like a more complete high as far as effects and where they occur in you. Seems like there is a definite “form” to the high whereas certain strains leave you with an ambiguous vague undefinable non-local high this bubba kush high is one that seems almost perceptible.”
“Def my top 3 strain. the smell, taste and effect are what i love. i simply cant get enough.”
“very potent”

“Bubba Kush is the best strain I have ever consumed. It is the most mellow, spacey high, but I can focus really well. Only downfall is extreme drowsiness can occur. But for some, that's a good thing.”
“I'm more of a sativa girl myself but this strain is absolutely amazing great stress reliever and it didn't make me feel tired as I thought. Would def recommend!!!!”
“I'm more of a sativa girl myself but this strain is absolutely amazing great stress reliever and it didn't make me feel tired as I thought. Would def recommend!!!!”
“One of; if not, my favorite strain. So relaxing.”
“Nice high but makes you tired as hell.”

“this Strain is great for strong pain it helps well for head aches arthritis neck and back pain it is relaxing and uplifting Green Pharms in Mesa always has the Strains that work best for me thanks Green Pharms”
“yummy”
“Stinky shit , hits straight away.Great taste 👌”
“Beautiful hairy buds. Great smell and very relaxed stony high.”
“grinds great , very sticky reacts quickly great stuff”

“Nice balance of cerebral effects as well as an overall body sedation that is calming while also pain relieving. Would recommend to any patients with chronic pain, migraines, anxiety, or depression. 9/10”
“the bomb... its my fav.”

“I've always been a fan of sweet indicas (cherry pie is my favorite strain of all time) but the earthiness of this one makes it special. I felt chilled out yet energetic and happy. The biggest thing I noticed was how dank it was. I left a couple grams in 2 ziploc bags wrapped in the clothes in my gym bag in my car, and when I came out an hour later my whole car reeked. It's an incredible strain and I highly recommend ...”

“this is one of my top strains I've tried, I've had trouble with some other indica about helping me sleep and stay asleep, after 2 bowls of this I was on my ass and with in the next hour I was asleep and didn't wake up for 10 hours! nice warm relaxing feeling throughout my body really hazy hard couch locking, I'd recommend!”
“Smokes nice out of a rig and gives a heavy tired high.”
“This strain doesn't take too much to get you high. You'll really enjoy s music to the point you may serenade your bong”
“Great indica for sleeping or heavy relaxation.”
“Definitely an 8 out of 10 + has a fantastic taste... #FANTASTIC”
“This strain doesn't take too much to get you high. You'll really enjoy s music to the point you may serenade your bong”
“Great indica for sleeping or heavy relaxation.”
“Definitely an 8 out of 10 + has a fantastic taste... #FANTASTIC”
“Great high. Creativity is definitely heightened. Heavy relaxed feeling and great sleep!”
“i love this med, like most indica's it is a nice one hitter for me! love the taste.”
“Kinda taste bad , super sticky .. Nice relaxing buzz”
“The first strain I fell for, this heavy hitter! Bubba kush makes you feel insanely relaxed, drifting into a cozy sleep. This strain always made me smiley when I smoked it.”
“I honestly thought that Headband was my favorite strain. but this Bubba Kush is the best strain I've ever smoked. I was so surprised by how smooth it was.”
“really knocks you on your ass, hungry, happy, alittle nervous but altogether very nice”
“strong body high and very pretty”

“smoked a bowl, and got paranoid af. 
good shit”
“i had a panic attack on this strain. my fault, technically, but lightweights beware.”
“Slummmmmmpppp”

“Super relaxed and happy. 
Not very motivated”

“I was blessed to have my best friend and business partner send back an ounce of Bubba Kush. Bright green, completely covered in trichomes, with purple on the inside. Very pretty and dank smelling nuggets. This is a very helpful strain for pain, especially of the joints (my knees for example). Also a great cure to insomnia and headaches. Highly recommend to anybody trying to relieve pain, or just get super baked!”
“first time ordering and I am very impressed. The product was great. Smell and taste were great and the high very nice. Will definitely be ordering in the near future.”
“Slummmmmmpppp”

“Super relaxed and happy. 
Not very motivated”

“I was blessed to have my best friend and business partner send back an ounce of Bubba Kush. Bright green, completely covered in trichomes, with purple on the inside. Very pretty and dank smelling nuggets. This is a very helpful strain for pain, especially of the joints (my knees for example). Also a great cure to insomnia and headaches. Highly recommend to anybody trying to relieve pain, or just get super baked!”
“first time ordering and I am very impressed. The product was great. Smell and taste were great and the high very nice. Will definitely be ordering in the near future.”

“I did not enjoy this at all. Only good for sleep maybe. After inhalation my body would start to feel dizzy. The room would spin with my eye's closed and I would feel nausea. After those effects all I want to do is kind of mope off to sleep. I don't know if it is because of the pre-effects that ruined everything else or what but it just does not work for me.”

“Love the sweet and earthy flavor. The high is great for being able to remain focused and productive. I do wish it would last a bit longer. This is a great strain for a person who works a 9-5 and just needs something to kick start their day. Great strain to unwind with after work as well.”

“Mellow buzz, mixes well with other buds, especially Animal Cookies.

I don't love the taste of Bubba by itself, but it improves the flavor of everything I eat until the buzz wears off, and more so than regular munchies.

My first time with this, I followed it with a bowl of ice cream and specifically remember saying This ice cream tastes like a secret."”"
“very mellow, relaxed high. quiets the mind”
“almost immediately after smokin it i felt laid back and goofy . Very chill relaxing high, not too much to where i pass out.”
“Quality strain👌 very good if you suffer for sleeping problems 🍁🍁”

“I just tried this strain recently and loved it! It smells fanatic! Can def smell a citrus-y smell and can taste a chocolate/coffee taste on the exhale. After I get over the initial punch in the head it gives me (haha), I have the best euphoric high ever. My favorite thus far.”

“Has citrus notes that leave the body feeling very tingly and relaxed. pretty decent lasting high about 2-4 hours after smoking a gram. smoke isn't too heavy though the lil nugs are pretty dense i was expecting it to be a lot heavier but it was nice and smooth in my bong and joint. bubba is a little too resinous for joints tho.”
“This is my go-to for kicking insomnia in the ass.”

column4: but it's definitely a really classic

column3:
“Whew! Just the heavy-hitting indica I was looking for. Sometimes when I get home from work my brain is still wired and I can’t settle down, even though I’m physically exhausted. One bowl of Bubba Kush, and I’m usually dead asleep within 15 minutes tops. If you can find yourself still alive after toking this bad boy, you’ll be getting really hungry. 

From a medical standpoint, I find it helps most with nausea, lack o...”

“It's not really my thing, but it is definitely great for insomnia. Thorough couchlock and munchies. And I could smell it from a mile away. So it definitely has some pleasant qualities, but the high just wasn't quite pleasant enough.”
“This strain made me step in the mud for no explicable reason. What does that even mean? Made me euphoric, with a clear head an strong body buzz.”
“pre98 bubba much better”

Cheers to ALL Growers, Caregivers, Guilds and Good People Spre...”

“very nice feeling and relaxing. I am treating chronic pain and found this to be a favorite”
“Excellent strain. I found it strong but unlike many strong Indicas (for me), it did not make me drowsy.”
“Fave of all time!!! Deep....full dank kush heaven!”
“I love Bubba Kush. it's my favorite strain. It makes me feel so much better about life and want to do more with myself.”
“Great body high, not so much of a mind high. Causes an extreme case of the munchies.”

“This shit was nice people, this is the exclusive strain for this dispensary and is definitely worth it.  Very trippy!”

AMAZING... Just sayin) and I made a pizza. I ended up laughing like an idiot and then I got lost in my p...”

“I don't know if the quality I got is a bit higher than what's generally out there, but this stuff is classic indica, and always managed to knock me out (in a good way). After a long day at work, it's great for chilling out with the wife, cooking dinner, and easing into a relaxing evening at home. Not great for going out. Has a pleasant earthy/hashy taste, but my wife hates the smell. Lucky for me, I vaporize, so not ...”
“love the strain.”

“love the bubba”
“As a frequent kidney stone sufferer, Bubba Kush is a prime strain for pain management. Next to OG, the heaviest Kush I can find, but it still makes your brain feel stoned. Great stuff.”
“this is my go to strain for any ailment i love bubba kush”

“Bubba Kush is a quality strain which gives you exactly what you would expect from an indica. Typical symptoms of dry mouth, sleepiness, and euphoria.

The inhale is very smooth and the exhale leaves an earthy flavor with a hint of coffee and Swiss chocolate fragrances. 

The aftermath quickly led to dry mouth then a physical sense of euphoria making it easy to get comfortable almost anywhere. In addition, loss of app...”

“The taste of this strain is super and effect is very nice but for some reason I get super small yields with Bubba every time. I have tried LED and HPS with this strain but yields are always -30-50% smaller compared to other strains. 

I have always topped the plants 1 time. I don't know is this the problem?

PS. I grow in soil.”

“While I'd give this strain a 7 for strength compared to some other Indicas, I give it an overall 8 because it works so well for the symptoms that plague me the most, namely insomnia and stress.”

“amazing head and body high, if I had to go with any it would be bubba kush and Girl Scout cookies :)”

“Too much made me a little paranoid and it gives you couchlock for sure.  This helped me get to sleep and helped my arthritis though. Gave me a good appetite and made me feel a little spacey, in nice way. Head in the clouds sleepy, great for night time relief after a hard days work.”

unfortunate...”

“Really great, and hits me harder than any other strain. Two hits and I'm blazed as hell. Instant migraine relieve, profound muscle relaxation, and deep sleep after a relaxing, deeply enjoyable high.

“As a novice user the first time I smoked this strain I felt the first 15 minutes my heart wanted to beat out of my chest...… BUT then I felt as though the spirit of Bubba Kush came down and took over my body/soul as I became a very relaxed, non-stressed, happy and non worried person. .  I fell into relaxation and then much needed peaceful sleep. Great strain right before bed.”
“Good for night time.”

“Was a nice mellow high.  Didn’t really make me hungry or give me the giggles.  My wife really enjoyed it and is moving to one of our top strains.  I couldn’t really taste anything more then a wood / ceadar taste.  She said if she exhaled through her nose she could taste more of a blue berry taste.”
“it will surely knock first timers on there ass and probably put them to sleep”

“I never gave all that much attention to the Bubba because, I’ve always been very hung up on it’s relative, OG Kush. In Florida, only one dispensary sells a Bubba Kush distillate w/ cannabis-derived terpenes; GrowHealthy. After trying ~95% of the different distillates currently available to FL MMJ patients, I can say with full confidence that this one is the BEST! No contest at all! I’m still amazed at the quality of ...”

“This strain smashes my body and face into the ground.  If you’re planning on being productive, forget about it.  Be ready for the pillow or the couch.  When I’m ready for bed, this is my go to strain.  I’ve yet to make edibles with it but if it’s anything similar to vaping, then I expect to sleep like a baby.”
“anyone know what ppm it feeds at?”
“This is a great couch lock strain. It also relieved a headache I had and upped my appetite which made normal food seem way more flavorful!”

“I fell in love with this strain because of its medicinal properties. My father-in-law and I smoke this strain and fell into a deep feeling of relaxation. Followed by deep sleepiness and an intense case of the munchies. My father-in-law just recently had hernia surgery and upon asking him about his pain he replied with I forgot".”"

“Ok, OK..... So get ready for a powerful power ranger episode in Miami. Because this here will make you feel like there are little tiny beings that just massage your brain.

On that note, I hot half mass and this ship is driving into fuckyea-ville" where I will become mayor.

column1: Just imagine that if this strain had a personal nickname.... It be called voltron”"

column3: “Instantly put a stop to my panic attack.”

“Inexpensive (I can get 4 pre rolls for about $13) at my local dispensary. Smooth burn, but doesn’t stay lit for long. Great for smoking first thing when I get home or right before bed. Effects only last a couple hours. One of my favorites!”

“I find myself reading reviews about this strain i just smoked and contently eating red and green m&ms making a firm belief that they taste better than the blue and yellow ones as if color has flavor. That is my current content level. Two thumbs up.”
“this strain is great for ego dissolution and making/askjng questions about yourself if youre into that. very good for munchies, laughing, and watching movies on the couch as well.”

“One of my favs, if u really enjoy indo weed, u gotta try this. Im in love with this strain.
I bought some OG Bubba Kush and its pretty f*****g great”

“cool”
“Best strain I’ve tried so far. Very energized feeling yet also relaxed. Also a little anxious.”
“I got so lazy. I am going into a happy euphoria. I'm planning to go to my first greatful dead concert later in the year. I think I found the strain the strain to bring”
“After my 4th bowl my vision got blurry and my whole body started to tingle everything seemed black and white. 5\5”
“smoked a bowl then walked back to my place. I felt like I was floating. my whole body had a relaxing feel. got back to my place and had couch lock for the next few hours”

“Bubba kush is some of the best weed I have ever smoked. It’s gives a really good feeling and a very big high it was like I my head was at a concert it was moving then I got tired af and fell asleep after having sex.”

“Truthfully Speaks for Itself”

“This strain is a classic and a must for anyone seeking relaxation or a quick cure for anxiety. It definitely has a sleepiness effect to it, like a classic Indica does,  but it depends on how much you use In order to achieve that. This strain is not necessarily for the creative types as it definitely does it’s job of curbing anxiety and restlessness,  but I think it’s definitely a must have and any collection because ...”

“The perfect strain! It's relaxing, It gives you that feeling of euphoria. At times you'll feel yourself with your mouth open and you don't know why. Gives you a great stone feeling. Great medicine for pain.”

“Exactly as this strain review says this is a very calming and relaxing strain its got my body numbed and chill with my brain in some kinda beautiful wonderland I highly recommend this one I've been a long time smoker over 23 years and just a little dab of this has me passed the clouds”
“holy shot man I am so fucking baked ..this has some super amazing energy. .I had a seizure so the CBD'S are helping me...totally worth it to ride the high while stoned...”

“Very calming and relaxing love melting into my bed feeling definitely recommend 🤪”
“KO. That speaks for itself! Maybe too strong! Lol”

“Now this is my baby lol this is my go to when i want to mix and mingle some strains, its like a booster. When my budtender told me he was out,i almost cried but went with Gamechanger.
 By itself, bubba is a good high, you're relaxed but not glued to the couch and gives you a good sleepiness (not too heavy). You can mix with a sativa and be good all day until you're ready to whine down, or another indica for a full co...”
“good high! been smoking it for a week now and realized it gets you really really hungry.u dont feel high, u can still focus and go on with your day.”

“Really great taste and smell but do not let it fool you...you fuck around and smoke too much of it....if its Real Bubba Kush n I promise you you ain't going to get too much done you'll be catching z after mf z 😴 lol”
“This is a really good strain of weed keeps you in the now.”
“This strain is amazing”
“Outstanding calmness and relaxation.”
“Super dense but oh so stoney...”

“Let me first say... all weed is good weed. This weed did not however blow my mind. I feel relaxed however and mellow. I noticed myself cleaning more than normal and focusing on organizing. I smoked with a bong and instantly felt strong effects. Both my roomate and I can agree that this is a quality stain, but again nothing that will push you out of body.”

“Live this strain. Probably one of the most sedative strains I've tried, and I've tried A LOT for my chronic sleeping issues. It also helps my chronic fibro pain (and flu pain, body aches, chills). It doesn't fix my broken  self but it does make me feel less messed up! Lol. I tend to avoid strains that can potentially make me anxious, since I have constant hypervigilance & anxiety and have had some bad experiences wit...”
“wow insane tastes fire too”
“helps if you have trouble sleeping. i usually have lots of stress so with this strain i usually feel stress-free.”
“This is a serious sleep / comedown strain. If you need to get everything off your mind and get comfortable, get this. You're still functional and can converse. No Munchies.”

“I am going to rate this strain based on the following; 
Appearance: Frosty bud, with lots of orange hairs and hints of lime green and purple. Very small nugs though, overall looks: 5/10

Aroma: hints of citrus with the pungent indica smell, but doesn't smell too much. 6/10

Taste: Hints of cinnamon and lime on exhale. 5/10

High: starts off with sensations throughout the body and vibrations, then turns into a uplifte...”
“Very Good Strain!”

“This strain packs a killer body high. It is great for just chilling and watching tv or movies. The only reason I am not giving it a 5/5 is because the smell of the bud itself is unappetizing. To me the flower smells almost spot-on like Sauerkraut. This of course is subjective (I personally hate the smell of sauerkraut). And when I say I hate the smell of Sauerkraut  I mean it quite literally makes me gag. Besides tha...”

“Great stuff for falling asleep, and doesn't make feel groggy in the morning (I usually do). Even when I hit a bunch of this stuff, I still feel fresh as a daisy the next morning, and am able to get up and move around. It's not great for much else besides sleeping (for me, at least), but that's fine, since that's what I use my medication for mostly anyway.”
“bubba is great for pain and insomnia.”
“Very nice for sleeping and chilling”
“Good smell and good taste if grown organically. Good body buzz I prefer my bud a little more heady though”
“Had some live resin “terp sauce” of this strain and it had my legs tingly and nerve pain cut down severely. Great for before bedtime or bad pain days though it does cause some drowsiness.”

“Taste great and the high lasts pretty long one of my favorite strains”
“Good bud, not top top shelf but it's pretty good dank”
“From the 2010 SF Medical Marijuana Competition”
“Pre 98 Bubba Kush Rules”

“Super stoned!  Bubba Kush will firmly plant your ass in the couch!  My only expeditions from the couch have involved food or the bathroom.  Just short of overwhelming, my body is relaxed, calm, my eyes are heavy and I seem to have doubted my gravitational pull.  Game on!”

Has an unbelievable berry smell, hits hard!  (Katsu Cut)”

“As i took a first it, right away i started coughing for a while. After i started to listen to no turn unstoned then the song was making me feel paranoid about if my mom would come home and walk into my room and her seeing me doing this. I changed the song right away to Casey Jones by grateful dead then i was relax and and calm.”

“Pretty strong and very awesome indica. I got couch locked so often with this stuff. Still a fantastic strain. You just can't go wrong with it.”

“The Bubba Kush that i was able to retrieve was very light in color because of the thc content it contained. It also had several different spots where you could clearly see plenty of purple but we all know they just grow it a certain way so it contains those colors. I was mostly surprised with the flavor it carried. In my opinion the flavor was an even mix between a deep earthy tone and a light fruity essence. The eff...”
“very strong indica strain. really strong head high. perfect if you ned to get some sleep or have unbearable pain”
“A great body high that makes you lock to couch as your appetite goes way up and mind goes into a nice euphoric boost.”
“A really good chill weed or get things done weed. I can totally function and I've never been more creative. I like.”

“real strong strain good for insomnia and pain(back,joint,muscle-muscle spasms) ,medium muchies,just all around couchlock ,calming, no stress only drop fall i had with this strain was headaches ,it would start in the head with a rush like your your brain is going to explode and then it jus starts racing they your body ovall a real good strain of ganja”

“Has citrus notes that leave the body feeling very tingly and relaxed. pretty decent lasting high about 2-4 hours after smoking a gram. smoke isn't too heavy though the lil nugs are pretty dense i was expecting it to be a lot heavier but it was nice and smooth in my bong and joint. bubba is a little too resinous for joints tho.”
“Happiness, conversational”

“love this strain haha love the feeling when you want to get up  and get a bowl of cereal but
 your body is glued to the couch .... love how it relaxes my pain ....”

“I was blessed to have my best friend and business partner send back an ounce of Bubba Kush. Bright green, completely covered in trichomes, with purple on the inside. Very pretty and dank smelling nuggets. This is a very helpful strain for pain, especially of the joints (my knees for example). Also a great cure to insomnia and headaches. Highly recommend to anybody trying to relieve pain, or just get super baked!”
“Slummmmmmpppp”
“I really in enjoy this classic strain. Stay so true to its root of being an easy going  indca. It's a must try!”
“What a great strain! Got this from my local dispensary Gold Coast Wellness and it was fantastic. Super giggly high, had me in a great mood all day :)”
“Kinda taste bad , super sticky .. Nice relaxing buzz”
“i love this med, like most indica's it is a nice one hitter for me! love the taste.”
“Smoked some of this out of my bong last night, I got baked, This strain is perfect for sleep aid, the taste was good, smelt Dank, buds looked nice as hell.”
“Hands down, best strain i have had in awhile, Highly recommend 10/10”
“Smokes nice out of a rig and gives a heavy tired high.”

“I've always been a fan of sweet indicas (cherry pie is my favorite strain of all time) but the earthiness of this one makes it special. I felt chilled out yet energetic and happy. The biggest thing I noticed was how dank it was. I left a couple grams in 2 ziploc bags wrapped in the clothes in my gym bag in my car, and when I came out an hour later my whole car reeked. It's an incredible strain and I highly recommend ...”
“Beautiful hairy buds. Great smell and very relaxed stony high.”
“yummy”

“This might be one of my favourite strains so far. I’m still a novice smoker, having only had a handful of different types in the last year and a half. But this one is definitely my favourite. The high kind of crept up on me but it left me feeling super comfy, like I was literally sitting on a cloud. I smoked quite a bit and was baked beyond belief. Went to bed and woke up still feeling it. Definitely would recommend....”
“I'm more of a sativa girl myself but this strain is absolutely amazing great stress reliever and it didn't make me feel tired as I thought. Would def recommend!!!!”
“Great strain, good flavour and gets you really medicated. I highly suggest trying this strain if you can get your hands on it.”
“very smooth and GREAT taste!”

“It has a very earthy, sweet flavor. I smoked one bowl in the morning which made me energized and put me in a great mood for the day. I smoked one bowl in the afternoon which helped me sit and relax after a long day. And then I smoked one before bed which helped me get a very restful sleep. Great strain over all!”
“one of my favorite indicas, it's a quick head high mixed in with a melting body high, very relaxing physically and good for easily slipping into sleep and”
“A wonderful mellow high. Left me feeling relaxed and positive. Made me pretty sluggish and stuck to the couch.”
“over ratted”
“Great for nighttime use. Knocks me right the fuck out. Very relaxing, and overall a very potent strain.”

“wow this batch has a real good lemon zip right off! !! nice tight darkish buds lots of crystals. very good for social meeting and good pain relief. aphrodisiac qualities. ..whatever sweetener he used worked and good flush”

“this is an awesome strain if the grower doesn't cut corners. I got some that smelled great look great tasted great but the high just wasn't there and it squeaked as if you were cutting up plastic when you cut it. Growers are being greedy and not curing properly.”

“Perfect strain for night time early am use. Relaxes you completely deep body buzz and over all just perfect buzz. I'm a straight sativia smoker but this indica just made me a believer :) I sware I'm even experiencing tripping like effects:) lol:)”

“Very good strain after a long day of work or if you have some stress , after like 40 min or so I end up falling asleep or in a heavy couch lock and everything seems to go by Super slow and it feels good ...definitely one of my top five indica's”

“The first hit off my pen leaves me heavy headed and my eyelids suddenly feel like sandbags are attached to them.  Two more and a sedentary warmth starts to spread through my body. Lovely for insomnia and vegging out”
“Made me feel relaxed, peaceful, and euphoric and had a very sweet taste”
“My personal favorite strain. Very relaxed high with minimal negative effects.”

“I was gone. I was seeing clowns in the kitchen. my boyfriend and his friend were laughing at me cause I didn't wanna turn the light out and it was a good ass night. chill and relaxed . one of my Favorite strains 💗”

“I like this better than most but still not as much as OG strains, when I opened the bag, (sealed) I smell hit me I've never noticed before n the only way I can describe it was, vegtables....the buds were disappointing to look at, stringy n small. well just say looks can be decieving! the high was better than most! i really like that it was slow burning too! it lost 2 stars cause of taste and appearance and smell. but...”
“superb! Quick heavy head high, euphoric and dreamy. Beautiful sugar coated purple buds. Paid full price, but worth it. Perfect bedtime bud.”
“real chill high,just vibin with my bros,loved the taste,very good plant”
“Solid indica. Helps with pain. I use in the daytime, but I like mostly indicas”

So yeah, took it neat. Altered perception. Could not really absorb more than...”

“i smoked a joint of this with my friend in his garage. passed out the next minute. i dont remember what happened i just remeber throwing the roach out the garage and then waking up on the floor slaps to the face. THIS IS THE GOOD SHIT”

column4: I can't feel my legs..."  Smoke too much of this earthy flavored goodness and you just might lose feeling in the rest of your body too.  You've been warned!”"

column3: “Great strain.”

“This high rocked my a** and gave me a super intense couch lock after three hits.”

“This strain is so bomb. Gave me mad giggles, great body relaxation, and also some major munchies”
“Great with my morning coffee to start the day. Great at the end of the evening when I'm ready to relax from a long day at work. No pains, no stress, no muscle spasms. The flavor is smooth.”
