“it helps with my back pain. helps me relax.”

“The smell is always super powerful just like its effects. This will take any plans or motivation previously had away unless those plans were to eat food :) One of those strains I can only smoke before bed. It takes away pretty much any negative feeling in your body and leaves you totally relaxed and happy.”
“I like this strain a lot, It hits you hard and keeps you out for the rest of the day.”
“Just like the description says, and good for sleep”
“Very pleasant!  Relaxed because my pain was eased.  Laughed and enjoyed my visit from a friend in Colorado. ;-))”
“Really nice flavor over greed bud”

“A great all around strain. Bubba Kush has nice looking buds both w light and dark green, and some dark orange hairs peppered throughout. After smoking I was hit quickly with a nice, relaxing head space. My stress levels also were dampened. As far as taste, to me, it pretty much tastes like good weed. Nothing really fruity, more earthy and hayish, but in a good way. This is a good strain to keep on hand that should pl...”
“A perfect combination of flavors that will leave your senses rippling. a great body and mind high that will leave all of your pain”
“not out of my mind high but defenetly a fun strain. make me super afectionate and a bottomless pit eater. 👍”

“smooth. almost a dark earthy flavor. beautiful buds.
The high is beautiful. I almost want to say its ideal. it brings back memories of my first encounter with 🌿.  the classic" high is what i call it

column1: Recommended that you check before acquiring as it seems to get almost stale unless in glass jars as it always should be.”"

column3: “A mouthwatering beauty that leaves you smiling.”

“This stuff is where it's at, the sweet hashish flavor is definitely more noticeable but nice deep hits bring out the chocolate and coffee for sure, actually really surprising how identifiable the flavors are when you hit it right. Provides a really mellow body high, would recommend to those who suffer from anxiety, stress, and chronic pain. Also a nice strain to smoke at night”
“Mine really does smell like chocolate and coffee. And I'm relaxed as fuck right now at a [6]. I have PTSD so I love to find good indica strains. This is by far my personal favorite.”
“Taste and looks amazing high quality cannabis coming out of White mountain health center!”
“Sleep solid for 4-5 hrs...Great right before bed.”
“lethargic.”
“It’s ok... makes me hungry lol”
“I enjoy the taste and smell but the feel never knocks my socks off.  Slightly heady with heavy eyes and a calm feel for me.”

“I feel like this strain is very good for those people that have trouble sleeping, it could be used before going to bed. But in the evening, taking this will make you feel drowsy and unfocused, so it's not the best for smoking before going out to a party or etc.”
“Great for pain and stress relief it's definitely a good night”

“Virtually no cerebral high, Bubba kush is all body high. Bubba kush is a long day at the spa, followed by the beach, followed by a nap. It's also a very euphoric high that really takes the edge off after a long long day.”
“i got fucking ripped bro one mount everest bowl from my b and your on your ASS. its amazing i love this strain”

“Mmmm tastes like grape still.  You can certainly tell the difference in some shatter. Like lemon sour diesel's citrus punch,  or master kush and it's pine. The distinct bite of bubba is that of molasses with power body  calming effect.  I've had shatter i prefer to this but bubba makes a fine bho. Great strain overall. I love the flower as well”
“Smoke a blunt of this and will last on you for a while at least 8+ hours. Makes you very paranoid”

“Update... this strain earned my respect! I now look forward to doing Bubba Kish for pain, sleep and appetite! Get it, you'll like it! 
---> old post <---I haven't made up my mind yet about this strain. This strain put me down! And that's an understatement! At first your eyes and your body become heavy. Your mind is jello but you find yourself focusing on more than one thing. It keeps coming, you start to feel aware o...”

“This strain is one of my favourite indica's. 
Makes me happy, relaxed and I'll sleep through the night!”

“Just tried it tonight and I must say it's absolutely amazing. Smooth and earthy yet slightly sweet. Even after eating and it being 3 hours since I smoked I still feel it. Super relaxing and the sleepiness is kicking in. Definitely a good strain if you are looking to sit and home and chill while watching some Netflix or Hulu or just simply kick back on a nice comfy couch or chair and just vibe out to some good music.”

“The Bubba Kush I received had big buds, that were forest green with dark orange hair all over, and crystals that sparkled! Upon crushing the bud and smelling, you get a pleasant odor that's earthy, with hints of coffee, as well as a pungent after-smell. 

For me, the sweetness wasn't as prevalent in the smell as it was the taste. The exhale leaves a taste of drinking  sweet, earthy, fresh-ground coffee. 

As for the ...”

“I've only had this once. It was really nice. Super Mellow! Very tasty. Have lots of snacks on hand. Did I mention super mellow? This is a great strain for pain relief and for a do absolutely nothing day.”
“good evening strain but not good for during the day”
“Amazing indica really relaxing”

“Very sedating and lazy, good for nighttime or a super lazy day. Has a really pleasant sweet hashy-kush taste and scent that lingers. If you like this try to find Bubba's Gift (Bubba x God's Gift), best cross I've tried with Bubba Kush and looks insane when grown well.”
“Bought an ounce, best time of my life. Never been happier”
“love the deep muscle relaxing high that is it gives. helps me forget all about my back pain.”

“I love this strain gives u a nice indica high which keeps you clear headed so u can play more complex games like heroes of the storm with no heavy buzz the only bad thing I can say about the strain is the high does not last long and can make you really hungry but really good for social activities since u can keep a convo going”
“Be careful.... couch lock.”
“Very heady, I like to use this to fall asleep with or use it when my back is hurting me(crushed L4 disc) and it takes the pain away.”
“I'll be honest, I've never been so disappointed about weed. It takes like 2 bowls to get me anywhere, and by then it's already wearing off. I wish I could get a refund on weed. Pretty bummed.”
“I enjoy when the heart rate increases, but the neurological activity in the brain dissipates 😑”

“bubba bubba always a great strain not to great to smoke in the morning before going to work lml I wanted something different tho grabbed two Ozs of king kush and couldn't resist a half Oz of bubba Kush”
“My absolute favorite. 10/10 every time.”

“I’ve had non-medical bubba before but it doesn’t hold a candle to the Ilera brand I picked up today. 

The flower is everything you want: dense, gorgeous buds with fiery foxtails, vibrant greens from lime to hunter with some subtle deep purples, and frosty with trichs.

The scent is the epitome of an Indica: pungent, earthy, spicy, and lemon/pine...and it is STRONGLY scented. I would happily have a sachet of this to ...”

“Some of the stankiest bud I've ever had! In a good way!! Soon as the bags were opened, the whole room was engulfed by the smell. Nice purple running through every nug as well as being showered in trichomes. The taste was very sweet, fruity, and quite powerful. Immediate high upon first exhale, left me zoning off into JFK conspiracies.”

“the strain is amazing !! gives you a mellow , calm , chill high or at least it did for me . only downfall i have is that i experienced an horrible headache afterwards and i was wondering if anyone else experienced the same thing .”
“bubba kush allowed my mind and body to completely relax. i have lower back pain and insomnia and this smoke makes me sink into the bed and fall asleep so fast! 😭”
“Not bad, not blow me away. Uplifting and relaxing. Not too heavy either. Solid high but nothing super special.”

“Bubba Kush/Bubba Platinum-

Flavor is mellow (Grape/Berry/)
Smells like (Lemon/Fruit)

High lasted about 2 hours.

Able to Stand and have a decent conversation.

*Very arousing be careful*
Decent high and not too heavy

4/5 stars”

“Great strain for a heavy smack-in-the-face high. Currently couch locked after 6 tokes off my one hitter. Been smoking this strain for a couple weeks now, and while it’s fantastic on good nights, when I seek it at the end of stressful days it completely fails to relieve stress or anxiousness. Feeling a little jittery, stressed, want to do work but very spaced out. 
The good highs are great, the bad are horrible.”
“hits you fast after smoking. very powerful indica! puts me in a great mood and makes me feel super relaxed. love bubba kush”
“great sweat taste to bubba kush. long lasting and will start in your head and move through your body... awesome experience.”
“My favorite strain and one of the best highs you will have. I would recommend this stain to anybody!”

“Really nice strain for my chronic insomnia. Very heavy feeling for body and heady, it’s like head in the clouds with thought deceleration. A little anxiety at heavier doses, but it fades beautifully into deep slumber (sleep this one off if you have too much). Odour is very dank, and heavy; taste isn’t much better. But boy, is this ever a great knock-out strain!”
“It's the kind that makes it hard to talk. Peaceful”
“i loVe the smell the density of the nug all the crystals perfect size nugs so fat”
“just got a good amount of this, been enjoying it and will be for a while =) love it”
“Very Stoney. Great for my appetite & sleep. I love Indica's like Bubba”
“Med Strong”
“Bomb ass bubba kush!!!”
“I did not like this strain at all I don't usually smoke so I am a light weight but this stuff messed me up bad. I don't think I will smoke this again.”
“I underestimated how much this strain actually turns me into a couch potato. Usually I can still get myself to go out and do things with other Indicas, but not with this lol.”

“Oh my! This is wonderful stuff. Definitely feeling a little couchlock, but not so bad that i absolutely cannot convince myself to get up like I've felt with some strains, lol. And very euphoric.  My ooonly complaint would be that i am a bit dizzy and slightly headachey. But...the relief it gives me otherwise is worth it.”
“bomb”
“gives a nice calm muscle relaxing high. Very good for nights your alone and need to blaze it up yourself. Very strong smell. Reminds me of the great OG kush.”
“It was fucking marvelous. Deff one of my favorite types of weed”
“Classic feel, wonderful strain. Not my favorite tasting, nor the strongest typically, but definitely my go to in a pinch.”
“Extremely tasty and a creeper buzz!.  Long lasting buzz and I didn't feel like sleeping after.”
“Dense & smells delish!”
“super good for pain but you will become a teeny bit paranoid.”
“one of the best strains their is. just picked up the concentrate from canadian mail order theblazerschoice.com really nice stuff !!”

“everything I'm looking for, helps me get along with others in mist situations, i can eat when I'm supposed to, i can sleep when I'm supposed to, same effects apply for blackwater, journeyman, herijuana, Bubba is a great indica!!!”
“Nice onset of buzz in the head, whole body relaxation. very chill.”
“not a favorite”
“the name is the big part lol”

“Arjan's version (Greenhouse seeds) pales in comparison to the original. The Pre-98 version is a kick-ass indica - one of my absolute favorites for anxiety and insomnia. This one is just straight-up unremarkable. :-(”
“My bedtime smoke for sure! Tastes great & it puts me in dream land in no time!”

“start: 11:04

11:23 still high, really feel it in my eyes”
“This strain is absolutely beautiful. And the smoke is isn't too harsh. cerebral and body high are in effect. don't think for too long or you might get stuck LMAO”

“This is a solid indica strain that can have you planted in the couch for a night if you so please. After a rough day at the office, Bubba Kush can help ease the pain and help you get the rest that you know you deserve. One of the better night time strains that I have tried in recent history. Warning: your dreams may freak you out after a night of Bubba Kush, but don't fret friends, they are only dreams.”
“loved this. gives u such a good mood.”
“Makes hella dank keef!”
“Not a bad strain in my opinion. It was ok but pretty mellow affects. I have had stronger bud.”

“it's on point strain..you smoke it and it gives you chills..

it makes you happy and lazy as fu”
“Just great 👌💯🔥”
“Pretty gnarly smelling weed, ultimate body high, though.”

“Wow my friend packed an unexpectedly fat bowl in a bong for me. As soon as I put the bong down I felt instantly lit like all the high just went straight to my head and I felt amazing. The high then slowly spread out through the body and I just felt so relaxed and happy and giggly. Love this strain.”
“Great against anxiety”

“was at the local dispensary and saw this on the menu, my main goal was to pick up only Sativas, but forgot to check what strain this was, and didn't bother asking. FOUND OUT THE HARD WAY, smoked it and passed out!
not hating on Bubba Kush but this is something you want to do at night time, after work, before you jump into bed.”
“#IFEELGOOD #BLESSED”

“Definitely a sleeper. I almost fell asleep on the bus right before my stop. It is a smooth doziness that doesn't just make you feel like puddy. I don't find this strain too strong or to do much. Pretty standard high, I'm not too paranoid or lazy or euphoric. I tried this early on when I first started medicating, so perhaps the lady was trying to get rid of a strain not many people were into. Overall it's a decent str...”
“Gets the job done. Couch lock to the max and all your problems vanish.”
“don't test this one out if you plan on being productive. it's better suited for those that want to kick back and relax.”
“bomb indica...even more bomb in shatter form! immediate stress killer”
“Really enjoying this. Not major couch lock, but a bit, enough energy to form thoughts. Would be nice sitting around a campfire nice and relaxed more in head than body but really good overall.”
“Pretty delicious, and a good purple bud”
“harsh. good high, but harsh.”
“Not bad of a strain, great taste.”

“Normally, I am fan of Sativas/Sativa dominant hybrids. I enjoy the creativity, physical motivation and abstract thought they provide. The potential couch lock and duuhhh" effects of Indicas kinda scare me
column4: Until I smoked some of this Bubba Kush....I am in my mid 30s and consider myself *fairly* mature...recently
column5: I was hanging out with some younger friends/co-workers and they were all 19-20 year old ghetto females. ...”"

column3: “How do I count the ways in which I love you, Bubba Kush! The first heady strain I ever saw years ago and I'll never forget the smell. So pungent and sweet!! Great high, great bud structure, consistent, sparkly as hell, deeeeeelicious!”

“This was the first strain I smoke about 2 and a half years ago. It had a sweet taste on the exhale and the smell is honestly to die for. If you want to have a chill time and laugh a lot, this is the way to go, a little goes a long way.”

“A decent strain, I can't seem to think of any particularly defining characteristics, other than its citrusy-skunky scent and the fact that it burns like premium Russian vodka on the way down.  A nice lazy buzz, though, and it's great for smoking out friends, as it is strong without being unaffordable.”
“the high was great... but the high only lasted an hour”
“Love the smell and look of it!!!”
“I love this strain. I can get work done and if I'm in the mood to just relax, I'm able to do that also.”
“Perfect when u r trying to feel relaxed”
“Holy indica: this strain can leave me couch ridden from the bong no problem. Two thumbs up.”
“Definitely One of my favorite Indicas. Wonderful & dense bud texture w/ hints of blues, purples, & a foresty green. Excellent for Anxiety, depression,@ PTSD. All around Great balanced strain.”
“Awesome space lift! Hits quickly and relaxes as time goes by.   Very relaxing at the end. One of my favorites already.”
“goofy, silly and heady high had me feeling very relaxed before the body high kicked in and slowed me down, but in a good way? feels like I'm on a hazy cloud.”
“Pretty sweet indica. Gave me a relaxed, eventually sedated feeling. Not a worry in the world, just at peace, almost meditative. Good for an evening chill out. A toke before the bed.”
“Nice rock like nuggs tough to break, pungent sent very earthy. Body stone gets you real baked.”
“Good smoke”
“Very relaxing, crazy body high I was high for a while also. Would smoke again”
“one of my favorite strains very tasty..among my top indicas”
“Let me tell you about my boy Bubba. Damn”
“love it one if not one of my most favored strain yet !!!!”

“Bubba is a solid anytime smoke for me.  Light enough for the day (for me but I smike alot) and it will give you the munchies which is good by me.  Go Bubba! This strain doesn't always get the respect it deserves.”

“simply amazing!  great taste,  appearance,  nice dense flowers,  would recommend to absolutely anyone looking for something great!  if you think that the critical is a nice buzz try this and see what smoking should really be like!!”
“Comes on light and smooth and settles in nice, heavy, and heady. Very relaxing. Would be excellent for pain in my opinion.”
“Warm, tingly and relaxed. A good night time buddy. I am melting into the bed. Lovely.”

“Definitely fun; more body than head high; made me a chatter box at times; I REALLY enjoy this weed!  I was highly stressed from work and this helped to reduce my anxiety.  So far, I don't know if it will help with sleep.”
“great strain. sedating good for night”
“Taste, Smell, Crystal Content, Density, All around Perfect”
“Very good, very mellow buzz. Perfect just before bed.”
“I used this strain my very first time smoking and was not disappointed . Great body high and surprisingly wasn't as much of a couch lock as people said.”
“nice body with some deep head influence would definitely recommend this strain”
“Juste Awsome”
“I love it. Amazing indica, I felt great and nothing mattered. A great de-stress strain.”

“This strain has a sweet, earthy taste with notes of coffee and a pungent kush-style exhale. Perfect before bed, this strain is extremely relaxing and can easily put you to sleep. Great for pain relief and anxiety as well. If you like Indicas this is a must try strain.”
“Didn't help with my insomnia as much as i was hoping it would, but it is super relaxing. Smells fantastic too.”
“I did a wake and bake with this and this was the best stuff ever. I absolutely love it easily my favorite weed.”

“if grown correctly as I always tell people....love the bubba kush.
 beautiful looking flower and nice relaxing high....over due it and u will have an awesome night of sleep”
“so relaxing”
“Didn't like the feeling much.”
“Love me some Bubba couch lock time!”
“..FuckTheDumb...”

“My day started out rough, I ate shit with a cig in hand. But when my guy brought this to me I knew just from the smell my day got better. It took half of what I normally smoke and I'm lit as fuck singing along to smash mouth with my friend in my car. 10/10 would recommend.”
“It doesn’t matter if I smoke it or vape it this strain makes me super giggly. I love it for pain management after hard exercise and for relaxing before bed. Also great for watching comedy.”
“This strain is very good for relaxing and eating also will keep you in a good mood, You will be happy you had it, hope you get a good batch.”
“Great laid back feel.”
“one of my favorite indicas!”

“Just wanted to state first—I'm not an indica fan by nature. Although, I do enjoy bubba kush as one of my nighttime go-to's.  It provides a beautiful body buzz and instant pain relief.  The mental effects are defined by a pronounced euphoria as the day's stress floats away :). I like it.”
“Personally just as great as sour with a relaxed deep element”
“big buds”
“Great body high on this, I felt like I was melting. Made me hungry and sleepy, pretty standard, but it wasn't without anxiety. When I tried a smaller amount I felt pleasantly calm and relaxed.”
“It's good stuff for sure. Very relaxed but not very sleepy. Just chill.”
“This is a nice bud for the end of a busy day.   Refreshingly easy on the lungs.”

“Bubba Kush Auto
Sweet And Potent Taste With A Good Relaxing High. Good For Begginners And Experienced Tokers.”

“Fantastic strain! Smoked heavy amount in large group, party type setting, and this stuff yielded some absolutely stellar conversation. However, what we have is from a dispensary and the bag says BB, for Bubba Bush. When we were told it was Bubba Bush originally I thought it was a typo and meant Bubba Kush considering I couldn’t find anything for Bubba Bush. So if Bush is the same as Kush, this strain will go down as ...”
“Such a classic strain! Super potent and smelly buds with a heavy body high and cerebral loosening" effects lol. Check out the full review here: https://youtu.be/VfdidkajNBQ”"

“It's very worth noting that Bubba Kush comes on with a bit of creeper, in my experience. I find you don't feel the full effects for three minutes or so. If you are a lightweight or sensitive like me I would recommend you go easy on this one at first and feel it out.

The bonus awesome part is that Bubba Kush can get you extremely fucked up. Light trails and color warping. Intense waves of sensation from the heavy b...”

“A true strain for the connoisseur. Bubba is. super dense with trichomes everywhere you look. If you let it flower the way you should, you will get the most awesome colors of purple to blue even sometimes. A true indica as its effects will put you in the dirt. Novice smokers medicate at your own risk.”

“I picked up some Sin City Bubba by : BaM

THC 23.09%   CBD. 0.04 % 
THCA 26.01 % 
TERPS - Limonene 2.4 
              Caryophyllene 3.02 

This 1/8 was basically little nugs  deep greens, reds, a bit dry - but good medicine . 

Smoked a few bowls of this and My God 😛 the CRAZY MUNCHIES set in 😬😬😬 LOL !   Not a huge fan of the munchies ; I typically try to stay away from strains that create Hellacious munchies 😝 ...”
“So yummy! Great find for me...smooth smoke, mellow effect, tasty goodness!”

“Tensing to the heaven, chill like a stone.
Earthy flavour, stoning hit. Just for sleeping, meditating or chillin without worries. 
Daily against stress.”

“Awesome strain great smell great flavor great stone hell its just fing great what can I say I've been smoking toking choking for a better part of 15 yrs and this is the first time I've tried bubba kush and ive found my new strain before this it was blue dream and Afgoo”
“bubba kush makes me cough but it is one of my favorites i love this strain any one have some for sale”
“I love it”
“I smoke this every night before I go to sleep, one of my favorites. Good stuff👍🏾.”
“excellent buzz. loved it. one of my top 5 favorites. anyone is lying if they say they don't like it”
“not bad the taste was a little harsh and it burned up quickly but over all not bad for a quick toke before you hit the sack at night to help you catch some zzz's and relax any sore mussels.”

“One of THE BEST strains I've ever tried in my entire life, oh god.... it can knock you out quickly and can get you stoned even faster. Reminds me of OG Kush because of the smooth, cook, tastiness of it. Definitely trying again”
“Felt very sleepy and calm. Got very hungry and over all killer high!”
“I rolled this beauty at McDonald’s. The rest .....is history😎”
“One of my favorites. Super chill. Kinda makes you feel like doing some of those things you been putting off doing. Then, a good movie is on and it's tomorrow before u know it.”
“relaxing in”
“Uplifting and euphoric hybrid.”

“Nice buds fully of orange crystals orangeish hairs fully body high  good pain relief very very 
  good”

“Okay, THIS is the good stuff. A very profound body effect that will have you ready to marry your sofa. Munchies aren't terrible either. This is as pleasantly relaxing a strain as I've found, excellent for anxiety, insomnia, etc.”

“This stuff not only smells but tastes amazing and if you need to keep the smell down it should be in an airtight container because the odor is outrageously pungent. The high is an amazing long lasting effect as it makes you want to just sit on the couch and watch Netflix.”

“This is the first weed I’ve ever tried... I didn’t feel sleepy at all, and I didn’t crave for food at all... I guess everyone is different. I have depression, it cleared my mind for a couple hours; not bad. I was thinking about nothing when I was high. And I talked a lot when I was high... can’t say it’s for depression, but I worked at some point.”
“Great for a relaxing, classic in-da-couch high. Really helping me through finals”
“this is by far the best strain i've ever had. it's great for dealing with things like insomnia and RLS. it's flavors are overwhelmingly good and it's so smooth on the inhale and exhale.”
“bubba kush is one of my favorite night time smoke very relaxing!”
“Bowl Smoked. Effects were Relaxed, Hungry, and Sleepy.”

“Bargain Bubba Budder. Say that 5 times fast. I had 2 nice pulls and I am pain free. Basking in a bubba blanket and almost alliterate.  Stinky soft yellow putty, smooth enough on the inhale, and tastes ok considering it was only $40gm!”
“I'm clearly not an Indica gal.”

“One of my favorite indices 
hands down”
“there's a reason why this strain is on the top 10. smell is very loud, taste is above others and the high was outstanding, took me on a very happy go lucky trip, I really enjoyed this strain”

“I like this chilling Indica strain. After smoking, I was watching african grey perrot talking just like a human being, which made me so laugh and impressed a lot. As an Indica strain, this gave me  less body high and less sleepiness. Perfect for having a conversation with my lover  night time.
There is no hangover feeling next morning!”
“This strain makes me vibrate 👹”

“The bubs were amazing looking, dense, hairy, and smelt amazing. But when smoked, it had a very strong earthy after taste. It was just strange to have such nice buds and buzz but a wierd tast like such.”
“By far the giving tree offers the best!!!! Bubba kush. Its quality is bar-none”
“just picked this up and I love it! not to heavy where I feel lazy, just right. took my back pain away immediately and it has a nice sweet taste.”
“Bubba Kush... where to start. I love most Indica strains, and this one just wasn't taking me where I want to go. Can't give an unbiased report because it just wasn't for me.”

“Very tasty herb. Sweet earthy flavors come through, with a nice coffee finish. The looks however are nothing special, averaged sized popcorn nugs with a decent amount of trichomes on them. Effects lean more to the indica side for sure. Very nice clear headed yet giggly body buzz. Fairly potent stuff too. would definitely recommend!”

“the taste and smell of bubba can be earthy and coffee like.  delicious.  the current bubba I have right now has a slight berry smell as well.  like they say heavy indica sleepy high.  great for nights inside”
“Not please with the Bubba. Maybe someone named Bubba grew it, because it was about as potent as a castrated bull.”
“This is about average for my preference. It aint bad. But it aint the best IMO. Gets the job done though. Bud is definitely gorgeous to look at though!”
“Not too strong..mouth was still becoming dry and my eyes red into late hours into the night. Got fucked by a dragon. Don't remember.”
“good strain, unlike other stains if u smoke too much it feels a bit like being drunk”
“Textbook high feeling”
“I've been smoking this all weekend and it gives you a great high where you feel very relaxed but it doesn't quite couch lock you or put you into a coma . It gives you a high that lasts all day .”
“For a time, it also smelt like ass...”

“okay. first try whit bubba kush , my legs made me almost cry because they were hurting , when i was hight i felt in a draem , big paranoia , my mouth was really dry , eye too i felt so dizzy too , worst kind ive ever tried”
“beautiful”
“This classic Indicia is a never failing go to, I love you Bubba !”
“Available as Indica Strain @ Grow Healthy for Cartridge and Syrige.  This looks like a great Indica option and I look forward to trying it.”
“well it had that bubba in their so i had to have some because I like that but the Skywalker mad it the shit! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
“Gets you past out to fuck. 20 grams of this stuff in one night hits you hard! Dry eyes and super dry mouth, man. Gnarly weed tho!”

“After vaporizing about 3 hits with my Puff-It, I feel a kind of nod" like I've heard heroin addicts might feel... I don't know... Ive only been smoking for about a year for muscle cramping... (Very effective).  After the quick 15-30 second "nod"
column4: I'm aware
column5: focused and ready to carry on.  A great strain for sure.  Excellent large buds.”"

column3: “Definitely gave me more of a bodily high rather than a mental high. Really is great for a lazy day or needing to calm the body for bed. Didn't give me a cough or the laughs either.”
“Not bad - not bad at all.”
“I will be forever faithful to the Bubba!!”

“Has a really fruity smell and a huge narcotic effect on me.  Smoked two bowls before bed and saw time/space warping in front of me just before I dozed off to a restful nights sleep.  I'm a fan of OG Kush and this seemed very similar to me. Would toke again.”
“Really disliked he effect this strain did to me, made me feel like I was sick, never had that happen to me before”
“Yes”
“*sung to the tune Mountain Dew"*

column1: Well they call it that good ol Bubba Kush
And it'll put you right on your tush.
If you fill up my bong
With that good ol Bubba Kush.”"

column3: “Nice strand for gaming... but really I am using this as a soapbox... I was reading comments last night and I don't remember what strain I was reading... someone made a comment about the election and said progress."

column2: I was tired last night and I hope this reaches the author who said the re-election of Obama and Colorado and Washington legalizing rec. mj was progress...I hate to use a comment here to respond to th...”"

column3: “Definitely One of my favorite Indicas. Wonderful & dense bud texture w/ hints of blues, purples, & a foresty green. Excellent for Anxiety, depression,@ PTSD. All around Great balanced strain.”

“Has anyone heard about the valley warrior of Bubba kush, it is said this great warrior smoked the herb in several godly ways, one of those ways being the cross joint. But then enemys from the bottom land below began attempting to take the great herb from it's rightful growers and owners, the Bubba people acted quickly and with ninja skill killed the lower ground people”
“Not nearly as much pain relief as I needed.  Will not buy again.”

“I have smoked everyday for thirty years. BubbaKush gives me a headache. Buds are darker green. Tastes a bit like a diesel-type strain. I am  a bit dissapointed. A little bit on the heavy side. I guess that it's better than nothing. On the other hand, there is a strain called BuddhaKush which is exceptional, if you can get it.”
“I enjoyed this strain.”
“One dab and I was tingly”
“Amazing, the most highest I've gotten and the hardest I have ever laughed in my life”
“Very relaxing and off to bed :)”
“Wasn’t a great psychoactive or body high; very mild”
“love the sweetness of the herb.”

“Nice strand for gaming... but really I am using this as a soapbox... I was reading comments last night and I don't remember what strain I was reading... someone made a comment about the election and said progress."

column2: I was tired last night and I hope this reaches the author who said the re-election of Obama and Colorado and Washington legalizing rec. mj was progress...I hate to use a comment here to respond to th...”"

column3:
“Really potent bud. Not something you'd want to smoke during the day. It's the best evening weed, and always puts me right to sleep. 
Makes listening to music 100x better”

“Bubba Kush is a mellow, light high on a personal note. Longer, dark green bud with a light frosting. I used it as a wake up, day starter... Really helped to alleviate stress, depression, and anxiety by replacing with a light, euphoric, and happy buzz. A better strain for lighter smokers.”

“After smoking one bowl, I felt the high start creeping up on me. I started packing a second bowl when the sleepiness kicked in but also felt very productive & the way I was thinking was deep. If you fight through the sleepiness, the high will be great!”
“Very nice relaxing high.”
“what was i going to say..oh yeah..damn ill write it later when i remember”
“left me with a nice giggly tired high but didn't get burnt out by it I just got sober comfortably”
“Bk helps me to sleep because of my insomnia from eczema. I have lower back pain and Bk helps”
“I love Bubba Kush. Inexpensive, it surprised me just how great it is. It's in top 10 for sure.”
“Perfect love is my favorite ;)”
“Tranquilizing, no stress, happy moods, great for chronic insomnia. New favorite”

“This review is from a septiva person who utilizes Blue Dream and Durban like coffee.  Bubba Kush is everything those are not. Very diesel like taste. Body high and a couch glue effect. Caution one hit at a time and judge the quit hit on the effect. Will put you out. If you over step When I train 6 days a week. God Buddha and the voodoo Methodist created Indica and for that 7th and Bubba Kush is a good one.”
“-PURPLE BELT BUD-”
“This Strain really did something the very first time I smoked it. It is hard hitting with a good taste.”
“Feb 3rd”
“Smoked some of this with some medical, damn.”

“one of the best strains I ever smoked like it gave me the worst munchies and then like some trippy ass paranoid shit then giggles then I fell asleep standing up , crazy shit haha
...sorry just ripped the bong a few times idk what I'm saying lol”
“This Strain really did something the very first time I smoked it. It is hard hitting with a good taste.”
“Again with all the raving reviews on this strain i was very disappointed in all round areas,And i have had from 3 different dispensaries and all have been a let down for the price”
“Bubba Kush is a great Indica that goes hand in hand with relaxation. The earthy aroma”

“The anxiety was too much, felt worse than before I smoked until I smoked a different strain. I had a couple hits of it earlier in the day, and had a much better experience. But when I had a gram later I had too much anxiety.”
“Saad has always had s2s。ちあ/”
“This Strain really did something the very first time I smoked it. It is hard hitting with a good taste.”

“Okay I finally wanted to do a proper review only a long time stoner can do got a joint of Bubba Kush and a bowl and a bong rip. first off nice tight buds lots of dark blue or purple. smells great when I crack open a bud. but as all organic smells like dirt or poop except blue dream never does lol this has that dirt smell till u break it up. awesome kush pine nutty smooth smoke great dry hit on the joint. can't wait t...”
“This strain is eh. A bit over the top if you have too much, witnessed someone firsthand”

“very heavy for the body. My preference when smoking is to be a bit more productive...I felt like I wasn't that present. I did have loads of fun fun fun moments...Wouldn't buy it again, felt really dizzy afterwards and drank about 10 liters of water....not my thang...”
“Bk is beneficial for me in regards to pain and insomnia”
“Definitely not my favourite indica; too much knock you off your ass with fatigue" and not enough pain relief.  Will not purchase again.”"
“Did nothing!!! Didn't like it Won't try again!!”

“MJ is feminine. A boys name for a strain is bad mojo.
Bubba kush is the runt of the landraces for indica. Super tight dense lightly frosted nugs. Shades of dark and light greens on the bud with tiny orange hairs. Smells light like dry poplar wood with a hint of hash. Taste is earthy. Light on inhale and expands a little on exhale. Moderate short cough. Relaxed body and mind that lasts long. A little happiness that is...”
“Interesting strain”
“Not bad”

“bubba kush is bomb. my pit even likes it 
:) fyi- only smoke indicas if smoking out a pup,they hate sativas.”
